TopicTitle: Game Save size determines memory leak in KSP 1.2 to 1.9 Bug report released. Upvotes needed

Articles.Content:
Squad have indicated in the past how important upvoting for bug reports is:

Please help

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/25218
Support issue moved to the support subforum.

Some content has been removed. The support subforum is for seeking support and info about game problems, whether from Squad or other players. And we  place things where they belong rather than how many views people hope their content gets. If you disagree with a moderator's action, please send the team a PM, since posting to dispute the matter in the threads derails discussions.

It probably also helps a lot, to have such a clear bug-report, with a clear measure of what needs to be fixed.  My thinking is that a programmer is more willing to dive into unfamiliar and maybe messy code if she has a clear goal.

I assume the axes on your plots are 
  kB used by KSP.exe
versus
  number of Load / Save / Scene-change events

There's a memory leak that is directly linked to the game save size.
